snippet.title: Golf Gang - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Golf Gang is the most chaotic game of mini-golf you'll ever play! Gather up to 8 people, enable wild modifiers like explosive collisions and growth spurt, and embrace the mayhem on any of the 6 playable courses!

Golf Gang is available NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1151050/Golf_Gang/ 

MULTIPLAYER MADNESS
Hit the ball while it’s moving, and race round the course at breakneck speed. Challenge your friends across Golf Gang’s three game modes and hundreds of holes to show them you’re the one that’s found the sweet spot between frenzy and finesse. 
 
MOD SCENE
Bend the rules to your liking and get creative with Golf Gang’s multiplayer modifiers. Combine low gravity, explosive collisions, and bullet time, plus many more, to create thousands of unique ways to play, each more chaotic than the last.
 
GOLF FOR GLORY
Compete with your mates for the top of the leaderboard in addictive time trials, classic, and hybrid modes. Golf Gang is all about that classic “just one more go” feeling, as you sneak in an extra hole or 18 during your lunch break! 
 
CUSTOMIZE EVERYTHING!
Turn heads on the course with custom skins, trails, hats, accessories and more, dazzling your opponents with style, as well as skill. Workshop creators can bring their modding skills to a new arena and utilize Unity to craft entire courses for the Golf Gang community!

Important Golf Gang Links! 
🎮 Golf Gang on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/11...
💬 Golf Gang Discord: https://discord.gg/8GevkuU2gd
🐦Golf Gang Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayGolfGang
📘 Golf Gang Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayGolfGang
🎵 Golf Gang Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@PlayGolfGang

Important Curve Games Links! 
🌐 Curve Games Website: https://curvegames.com/
🐦 Curve Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/curvegames
📘 Curve Games Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CurveGames
📷 Curve Games Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/curve_games
🎵 Curve Games Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@curvegames
▶️ Curve Games YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/CurveDigital?... 

Important Lazy Monday Games Links! 
🌐 Lazy Monday Games Website: https://www.lazymondaygames.com/
🐦Lazy Monday Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/lazymondaygames
